title: Untitled (Composition for a Peace Poster)
artistDisplayName:
Alberto Beltrán (Mexican, 1923-2002)
Elizabeth Catlett (American, active in Mexico, 1915-2012)
medium: Linocut in black on two sheets of cream wove paper
dimensions: Top sheet, image: 64.7 × 89 cm (25 1/2 × 35 1/16 in.); Top sheet, sheet: 70 × 94.8 cm (27 9/16 × 37 3/8 in.); Lower sheet, image: 63.5 × 89.5 cm (25 × 35 1/4 in.); Lower sheet, sheet: 70 × 95 cm (27 9/16 × 37 7/16 in.)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Prints and Drawings Purchase Fund
